CustomField.description: Total Line Price (Usage quantity multiplied by line's unit price)
CustomField.formula: IF(SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c > 0, SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c * SVMXC__Actual_Price2__c - (SVMXC__Discount__c*(SVMXC__Billable_Quantity__c * SVMXC__Actual_Price2__c)), SVMXC__Actual_Quantity2__c * SVMXC__Actual_Price2__c - (SVMXC__Discount__c*(SVMXC__Actual_Quantity2__c * SVMXC__Actual_Price2__c)))
CustomField.label: Total Line Price
